07.001.11: mā | śūne | agne | ni | sadāma | nr̥ṇām | mā | aśeṣasaḥ | avīratā | pari | tvā | prajāvatīṣu | duryāsu | durya
07.001.12: yam | aśvī | nityam | upa-yāti | yajñam | prajāvantam | su-apatyam | kṣayam | naḥ | sva-janmanā | śeṣasā | vavr̥dhānam
07.001.13: pāhi | naḥ | agne | rakṣasaḥ | ajuṣṭāt | pāhi | dhūrteḥ | araruṣaḥ | agha-yoḥ | tvā | yujā | pr̥tanāyūn | abhi | syām
07.001.14: saḥ | it | agniḥ | agnīn | ati | astu | anyān | yatra | vājī | tanayaḥ | vīl̥u-pāṇiḥ | sahasra-pāthāḥ | akṣarā | sam-eti
07.001.15: saḥ | it | agniḥ | yaḥ | vanuṣyataḥ | ni-pāti | sam-eddhāram | aṁhasaḥ | uruṣyāt | su-jātāsaḥ | pari | caranti | vīrāḥ
07.001.16: ayam | saḥ | agniḥ | āhutaḥ | puru-trā | yam | īśānaḥ | sam | it | indhe | haviṣmān | pari | yam | eti | adhvareṣu | hotā
07.001.17: tve iti | agne | āhavanāni | bhūri | īśānāsaḥ | ā | juhuyāma | nityā | ubhā | kr̥ṇvantaḥ | vahatū iti | miyedhe
07.001.18: imo iti | agne | vīta-tamāni | havyā | ajasraḥ | vakṣi | deva-tātim | iccha | prati | naḥ | īm | surabhīṇi | vyantu
07.001.19: mā | naḥ | agne | avīrate | parā | dā | duḥ-vāsase | amataye | mā | naḥ | asyai | mā | naḥ | kṣudhe | mā | rakṣase | r̥ta-vaḥ | mā | naḥ | dame | mā | vane | ā | juhūrthāḥ
07.001.20: nu | me | brahmāṇi | agne | ut | śaśādhi | tvam | deva | maghavat-bhyaḥ | susūdaḥ | rātau | syāma | ubhayāsaḥ | ā | te | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ
07.001.21: tvam | agne | su-havaḥ | raṇva-sandr̥k | su-dītī | sūno iti | sahasaḥ | didīhi | mā | tve iti | sacā | tanaye | nitye | ā | dhak | mā | vīraḥ | asmat | naryaḥ | vi | dāsīt
07.001.22: mā | naḥ | agne | duḥ-bhr̥taye | sacā | eṣu | deva-iddheṣu | agniṣu | pra | vocaḥ | mā | te | asmān | duḥ-matayaḥ | bhr̥māt | cit | devasya | sūno iti | sahasaḥ | naśanta
07.001.23: saḥ | martaḥ | agne | su-anīka | revān | amartye | yaḥ | ājuhoti | havyam | saḥ | devatā | vasu-vanim | dadhāti | yam | sūriḥ | arthī | pr̥cchamānaḥ | eti
07.001.24: mahaḥ | naḥ | agne | suvitasya | vidvān | rayim | sūri-bhyaḥ | ā | vaha | br̥hantam | yena | vayam | sahasāvan | madema | avi-kṣitāsaḥ | āyuṣā | su-vīrāḥ
07.001.25: nu | me | brahmāṇi | agne | ut | śaśādhi | tvam | deva | maghavat-bhyaḥ | susūdaḥ | rātau | syāma | ubhayāsaḥ | ā | te | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ
07.002.01: juṣasva | naḥ | sam-idham | agne | adya | śoca | br̥hat | yajatam | dhūmam | r̥ṇvan | upa | spr̥śa | divyam | sānu | stūpaiḥ | sam | raśmi-bhiḥ | tatanaḥ | sūryasya
07.002.02: narāśaṁsasya | mahimānam | eṣām | upa | stoṣāma | yajatasya | yajñaiḥ | ye | su-kratavaḥ | śucayaḥ | dhiyam-dhāḥ | svadanti | devāḥ | ubhayāni | havyā
07.002.03: iti | satya-vācam | manuṣvat | agnim | manunā | sam-iddham | sam | adhvarāya | sadam | it | mahema
07.002.04: saparyavaḥ | bharamāṇāḥ | abhi-jñu | pra | vr̥ñjate | namasā | barhiḥ | agnau | ājuhvānāḥ | ghr̥ta-pr̥ṣṭham | pr̥ṣat-vat | adhvaryavaḥ | haviṣā | marjayadhvam
07.002.05: su-ādhyaḥ | vi | duraḥ | deva-yantaḥ | aśiśrayuḥ | ratha-yuḥ | deva-tātā | pūrvī iti | siśum | na | mātarā | rihāṇe iti | sam | agruvaḥ | na | samaneṣu | añjan
07.002.06: uta | yoṣaṇeiti | divye iti | mahī iti | naḥ | uṣasānaktā | sudughāiva | dhenuḥ | barhi-sadā | puruhūte itipuru-hūte | maghonī iti | ā | yajñiye | suvitāya | śrayetām
07.002.07: viprā | yajñeṣu | mānuṣeṣu | kārū iti | manye | vām | jāta-vedasā | yajadhyai | ūrdhvam | naḥ | adhvaram | kr̥tam | haveṣu | tā | deveṣu | vanathaḥ | vāryāṇi
07.002.08: ā | bhāratī | bharatībhiḥ | sa-joṣāḥ | il̥ā | devaiḥ | manuṣyebhiḥ | agniḥ | sarasvatī | sārasvatebhiḥ | arvāk | tisraḥ | devīḥ | barhiḥ | ā | idam | sadantu
07.002.09: tat | naḥ | turīpam | adha | poṣayitnu | deva | tvaṣṭaḥ | vi | rarāṇaḥ | syasveti syasva | yataḥ | vīraḥ | karmaṇyaḥ | su-dakṣaḥ | yukta-grāvā | jāyate | deva-kāmaḥ
07.002.10: vanaspate | ava | sr̥ja | upa | devān | agniḥ | haviḥ | śamitā | sūdayāti | saḥ | it | oṁ iti | hotā | satya-taraḥ | yajāti | yathā | devānām | janimāni | veda
07.002.11: ā | yāhi | agne | sam-idhānaḥ | arvāṅ | indreṇa | devaiḥ | sa-ratham | turebhiḥ | barhiḥ | naḥ | āstām | aditiḥ | su-putrā | svāhā | devāḥ | amr̥tāḥ | mādayantām
07.003.01: agnim | vaḥ | devam | agni-bhiḥ | sa-joṣāḥ | yajiṣṭham | dūtam | adhvare | kr̥ṇudhvam | yaḥ | martyeṣu | ni-dhruviḥ | r̥ta-vā | tapuḥ-mūrdhā | ghr̥ta-annaḥ | pāvakaḥ
07.003.02: prothat | aśvaḥ | na | yavase | aviṣyan | yadā | mahaḥ | sam-varaṇāt | vi | asthāt | āt | asya | vātaḥ | anu | vāti | śociḥ | adha | sma | te | vrajanam | kr̥ṣṇam | asti
07.003.03: ut | yasya | te | nava-jātasya | vr̥ṣṇaḥ | agne | caranti | ajarāḥ | idhānāḥ | accha | dyām | aruṣaḥ | dhūmaḥ | eti | sam | dūtaḥ | agne | īyase | hi | devān
07.003.04: vi | yasya | te | pr̥thivyām | pājaḥ | aśret | tr̥ṣu | yat | annā | sam-avr̥kta | jambhaiḥ | senāiva | sr̥ṣṭā | pra-sitiḥ | te | eti | yavam | na | dasma | juhvā | vivekṣi
07.003.05: tam | it | doṣā | tam | uṣasi | yaviṣṭham | agnim | atyam | na | marjayanta | naraḥ | ni-śiśānāḥ | atithim | asya | yonau | dīdāya | śociḥ | āhutasya | vr̥ṣṇaḥ
07.003.06: su-sandr̥k | te | su-anīka | pratīkam | vi | yat | rukmaḥ | na | rocase | upāke | di vaḥ | na | te | tanyatuḥ | eti | śuṣmaḥ | citraḥ | na | sūraḥ | prati | cakṣibhānum
07.003.07: yathā | vaḥ | svāhā | agnaye | dāśema | pari | il̥ābhiḥ | ghr̥tavat-bhiḥ | ca | havyaiḥ | tebhiḥ | naḥ | agne | amitaiḥ | mahaḥ-bhiḥ | śatam | pūḥ-bhiḥ | āyasībhiḥ | ni | pāhi
07.003.08: yāḥ | vā | te | santi | dāśuṣe | adhr̥ṣṭāḥ | giraḥ | vā | yābhiḥ | nr̥-vatīḥ | uruṣyāḥ | tābh iḥ | naḥ | sūno iti | sahasaḥ | ni | pāhi | smat | sūrīn | jaritr̥r̥n | jāta-vedaḥ
07.003.09: niḥ | yat | pūtāiva | sva-dhitiḥ | śuciḥ | gāt | svayā | kr̥pā | tanvā | rocamānaḥ | ā | yaḥ | mātroḥ | uśenyaḥ | janiṣṭa | deva-yajyāya | su-kratuḥ | pāvakaḥ
07.003.10: etā | naḥ | agne | saubhagā | didīhi | api | kratum | su-cetasam | vatema | viśvā | stotr̥-bhyaḥ | gr̥ṇate | ca | santu | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ
07.004.01: pra | vaḥ | śukrāya | bhānave | bharadhvam | havyam | matim | ca | agnaye | su-pūtam | yaḥ | daivyāni | mānuṣā | janūṁṣi | antaḥ | viśvāni | vidmanā | jigāti
07.004.02: saḥ | gūtsaḥ | agniḥ | taruṇaḥ | cit | astu | yataḥ | yaviṣṭhaḥ | ajaniṣṭa | mātuḥ | sam | yaḥ | vanā | yuvate | śuci-dam | bhūri | cit | annā | sam | it | atti | sadyaḥ
07.004.03: asya | devasya | sam-sadi | anīke | yam | martāsaḥ | śyetam | jagr̥bhre | ni | yaḥ | gr̥bham | pauruṣeyīm | uvoca | duḥ-okam | agniḥ | āyave | śuśoca
07.004.04: ayam | kaviḥ | akaviṣu | pra-cetāḥ | marteṣu | agniḥ | amr̥taḥ | ni | dhāyi | saḥ | mā | naḥ | atra | juhuraḥ | sahasvaḥ | sadā | tve iti | su-manasaḥ | syāma
07.004.05: ā | yaḥ | yonim | deva-kr̥tam | sasāda | kratvā | hi | agniḥ | amr̥tān | atārīt | tam | oṣadhīḥ | ca | vaninaḥ | ca | garbham | bhūmiḥ | ca | viśva-dhāyasam | bibharti
07.004.06: īśe | hi | agniḥ | amr̥tasya | bhūreḥ | īśe | rāyaḥ | su-vīryasya | dātoḥ | mā | tvā | vayam | sahasāvan | avīrāḥ | mā | apsavaḥ | pari | sadāma | mā | aduvaḥ
07.004.07: pari-sadyam | hi | araṇasya | rekṇaḥ | nityasya | rāyaḥ | patayaḥ | syāma | na | śeṣaḥ | agne | anya-jātam | asti | acetānasya | mā | pathaḥ | vi | dukṣaḥ
07.004.08: nahi | grabhāya | araṇaḥ | su-śevaḥ | anya-udaryaḥ | manasā | mantavai | oṁ iti | adha | cit | okaḥ | punaḥ | it | saḥ | eti | ā | naḥ | vājī | abhīṣāṭ | etu | navyaḥ
07.004.09: tvam | agne | vanuṣyataḥ | ni | pāhi | tvam | oṁ iti | naḥ | sahasāvan | avadyāt | sam | tvā | dhvasman-vat | abhi | etu | pāthaḥ | sam | rayiḥ | spr̥hayāyyaḥ | sahasrī
07.004.10: etā | naḥ | agne | saubhagā | didīhi | api | kratum | su-cetasam | vatema | viśvā | stotr̥-bhyaḥ | gr̥ṇate | ca | santu | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ
07.005.01: pra | agnaye | tavase | bharadhvam | giram | divaḥ | arataye | pr̥thivyāḥ | yaḥ | v iśveṣām | amr̥tānām | upa-sthe | vaiśvānaraḥ | vavr̥dhe | jāgr̥vat-bhiḥ
07.005.02: pr̥ṣṭaḥ | divi | dhāyi | agniḥ | pr̥thivyām | netā | sindhūnām | vr̥ṣabhaḥ | stiyānām | saḥ | mānuṣīḥ | abhi | viśaḥ | vi | bhāti | vaiśvānaraḥ | vavr̥dhānaḥ | vareṇa
07.005.03: tvat | bhiyā | viśaḥ | āyan | asiknīḥ | asamanāḥ | jahatīḥ | bhojanāni | vaiśvānara | pūrave | śośucānaḥ | puraḥ | yat | agne | darayan | adīdeḥ
07.005.04: tava | tri-dhātu | pr̥thivī | uta | dyauḥ | vaiśvānara | vratam | agne | sacanta | tvam | bhāsā | rodasī iti | ā | tatantha | ajasreṇa | śociṣā | śośucānaḥ
07.005.05: tvām | agne | haritaḥ | vāvaśānāḥ | giraḥ | sacante | dhunayaḥ | ghr̥tācīḥ | patim | kr̥ṣṭīnām | rathyam | rayīṇām | vaiśvānaram | uṣasām | ketum | ahnām
07.005.06: tve iti | asuryam | vasavaḥ | ni | r̥ṇvan | kratum | hi | te | mitra-mahaḥ | juṣanta | tvam | dasyūn | okasaḥ | agne | ājaḥ | uru | jyotiḥ | janayan | āryāya
07.005.07: saḥ | jāyamānaḥ | parame | vi-oman | vāyuḥ | na | pāthaḥ | pari | pāsi | sadyaḥ | tvam | bhuvanā | janayan | abhi | r̥n | apatyāya | jāta-vedaḥ | daśasyan
07.005.08: tām | agne | asme iti | iṣam | ā | īrayasva | vaiśvānara | dyu-matīm | jāta-vedaḥ | yayā | rādhaḥ | pinvasi | viśva-vāra | pr̥thu | śravaḥ | dāśuṣe | martyāya
07.005.09: tam | naḥ | agne | maghavat-bhyaḥ | puru-kṣum | rayim | ni | vājam | śrutyam | yuvasva | vaiśvānara | mahi | naḥ | śarma | yaccha | rudrebhiḥ | agne | vasu-bhiḥ | sa-joṣāḥ
07.006.01: pra | sam-rājaḥ | asurasya | pra-śastim | puṁsaḥ | kr̥ṣṭīnām | anu-mādyasya | indrasya-iva | pra | tavasaḥ | kr̥tāni | vande | dārum | vandamānaḥ | vivakmi
07.006.02: kavim | ketum | dhāsim | bhānum | adreḥ | hinvanti | śam | rājyam | rodasyoḥ | puram-darasya | gīḥ-bhiḥ | ā | vivāse | agneḥ | vratāni | pūrvyā | mahāni
07.006.03: ni | akratūn | grathinaḥ | mr̥dhra-vācaḥ | paṇīn | aśraddhān | avr̥dhān | ayajñān | pra-pra | tān | dasyūn | agniḥ | vivāya | pūrvaḥ | cakāra | aparān | ayajyūn
07.006.04: yaḥ | apācīne | tamasi | madantīḥ | prācīḥ | cakāra | nr̥-tamaḥ | śacībhiḥ | tam | īśānam | vasvaḥ | agnim | gr̥ṇīṣe | anānatam | damayantam | pr̥tanyūn
07.006.05: yaḥ | dehyaḥ | anamayat | vadha-snaiḥ | yaḥ | arya-patnīḥ | uṣasaḥ | cakāra | saḥ | ni-rudhya | nahuṣaḥ | yahvaḥ | agniḥ | viśaḥ | cakre | bali-hr̥taḥ | sahaḥ-bhiḥ
07.006.06: yasya | śarman | upa | viśve | janāsaḥ | evaiḥ | tasthuḥ | su-matim | bhikṣamāṇāḥ | vaiśvānaraḥ | varam | ā | rodasyoḥ | ā | agniḥ | sasāda | pitroḥ | upa-stham
07.006.07: ā | devaḥ | dade | budhnyā | vasūni | vaiśvānaraḥ | ut-itā | sūryasya | ā | samudrāt | avarāt | ā | parasmāt | ā | agniḥ | dade | divaḥ | ā | pr̥thivyāḥ
07.007.01: pra | vaḥ | devam | cit | sahasānam | agnim | aśvam | na | vājinam | hiṣe | namaḥ-bhiḥ | bhava | naḥ | dūtaḥ | adhvarasya | vidvān | tmanā | deveṣu | vivide | mita-duḥ
07.007.02: ā | yāhi | agne | pathyāḥ | anu | svāḥ | mandraḥ | devānām | sakhyam | juṣāṇaḥ | ā | sānu | śuṣmaiḥ | nadayan | pr̥thivyāḥ | jambhebhiḥ | viśvam | uśadhak | vanāni
07.007.03: prācīnaḥ | yajñaḥ | su-dhitam | hi | barhiḥ | prīṇīte | agniḥ | īl̥itaḥ | na | hotā | ā | mātarā | viśvavāreitiviśva-vāre | huvānaḥ | yataḥ | yaviṣṭha | jajñiṣe | su-śevaḥ
07.007.04: sadyaḥ | adhvare | rathiram | jananta | mānuṣāsaḥ | vi-cetasaḥ | yaḥ | eṣām | viśām | adhāyi | viśpatiḥ | duroṇe | agniḥ | mandraḥ | madhu-vacāḥ | r̥ta-vā
07.007.05: asādi | vr̥taḥ | vahniḥ | ājaganvān | agniḥ | brahmā | nr̥-sadane | vi-dhartā | dyauḥ | ca | yam | pr̥thivī | vavr̥dhāteiti | ā | yam | hotā | yajati | viśva-vāram
07.007.06: ete | dyumnebhiḥ | viśvam | ā | atiranta | mantram | ye | vā | aram | naryāḥ | atakṣan | pra | ye | viśaḥ | tiranta | śroṣamāṇāḥ | ā | ye | me | asya | dīdhayan | r̥tasya
07.007.07: nu | tvām | agne | īmahe | vasiṣṭhāḥ | īśānam | sūno iti | sahasaḥ | vasūnām | iṣam | stotr̥-bhyaḥ | maghavat-bhyaḥ | ānaṭ | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ
07.008.01: indhe | rājā | sam | aryaḥ | namaḥ-bhiḥ | yasya | pratīkam | āhutam | ghr̥tena | naraḥ | havyebhiḥ | īl̥ate | sa-bādhaḥ | ā | agniḥ | agre | uṣasām | aśoci
07.008.02: ayam | oṁ iti | syaḥ | su-mahān | avedi | hotā | mandraḥ | manuṣaḥ | yahvaḥ | agniḥ | vi | bhāḥ | akar ity akaḥ | sasr̥jānaḥ | pr̥thivyām | kr̥ṣṇa-paviḥ | oṣadhībhiḥ | vavakṣe
07.008.03: kayā | naḥ | agne | vi | vasaḥ | su-vr̥ktim | kām | oṁ iti | svadhām | r̥ṇavaḥ | śasyamānaḥ | kadā | bhavema | patayaḥ | su-datra | rāyaḥ | vantāraḥ | dustarasya | sādhoḥ
07.008.04: pra-pra | ayam | agniḥ | bharatasya | śr̥ṇve | vi | yat | sūryaḥ | na | rocate | br̥hat | bhāḥ | abhi | yaḥ | pūrum | pr̥tanāsu | tasthau | dyutānaḥ | daivyaḥ | atithiḥ | śuśoca
07.008.05: asan | it | tve iti | āhavanāni | bhūri | bhuvaḥ | viśvebhiḥ | su-manāḥ | anīkaiḥ | stutaḥ | cit | agne | śr̥ṇviṣe | gr̥ṇānaḥ | svayam | vardhasva | tanvam | su-jāta
07.008.06: idam | vacaḥ | śata-sāḥ | sam-sahasram | ut | agnaye | janiṣīṣṭa | dvi-bahārḥ | śam | yat | stotr̥-bhyaḥ | āpaye | bhavāti | dyu-mat | amīva-cātanam | rakṣaḥ-hā
07.008.07: iti | sahasaḥ | vasūnām | iṣam | stotr̥-bhyaḥ | maghavat-bhyaḥ | ānaṭ | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ
07.009.01: abodhi | jāraḥ | uṣasām | upa-sthāt | hotā | mandraḥ | kavi-tamaḥ | pāvakaḥ | dadhāti | ketum | ubhayasya | jantoḥ | havyā | deveṣu | draviṇam sukr̥t-su
07.009.02: saḥ | su-kratuḥ | yaḥ | vi | duraḥ | paṇīnām | punānaḥ | arkam | puru-bhojasam | naḥ | hotā | mandraḥ | viśām | damūnāḥ | tiraḥ | tamaḥ | dadr̥śe | rāmyāṇām
07.009.03: amūraḥ | kaviḥ | aditiḥ | vivasvān | su-saṁsat | mitraḥ | atithiḥ | śivaḥ | naḥ | citra-bhānuḥ | uṣasām | bhāti | agre | apām | garbhaḥ | pra-svaḥ | ā | viveśa

07.062.03: vi | naḥ | sahasram | śurudhaḥ | radantu | r̥ta-vānaḥ | varuṇaḥ | mitraḥ | agniḥ | yacchantu | candrāḥ | upa-mam | naḥ | arkam | ā | naḥ | kāmam | pūpurantu | stavānāḥ
07.062.04: dyāvābhūmī iti | adite | trāsīthām | naḥ | ye | vām | jajñuḥ | su-janimānaḥ | r̥ṣveiti | mā | hel̥e | bhūma | varuṇasya | vāyoḥ | mā | mitrasya | priya-tamasya | nr̥ṇām

07.062.06: nu | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | aryamā | naḥ | tmane | tokāya | varivaḥ | dadhantu | su-gā | naḥ | viśvā | su-pathāni | santu | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ

07.063.04: divaḥ | rukmaḥ | uru-cakṣāḥ | ut | eti | dūre--arthaḥ | taraṇiḥ | bhrājamānaḥ | nūnam | janāḥ | sūryeṇa | pra-sūtāḥ | ayan | arthāni | kr̥ṇavan | apāṁsi

07.063.06: nu | mitraḥ | varuṇaḥ | aryamā | naḥ | tmane | tokāya | varivaḥ | dadhantu | su-gā | naḥ | viśvā | su-pathāni | santu | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ
07.064.01: divi | kṣayantā | rajasaḥ | pr̥thivyām | pra | vām | ghr̥tasya | niḥ-nijaḥ | dadīran | havyam | naḥ | mitraḥ | aryamā | su-jātaḥ | rājā | su-kṣatraḥ | varuṇaḥ | juṣanta
07.064.02: ā | rājānā | mahaḥ | r̥tasya | gopā | sindhupatī itisindhu-patī | kṣatriyā | yātam | arvāk | il̥ām | naḥ | mitrāvaruṇā | uta | vr̥ṣṭim | ava | divaḥ | invatam | jīradānū iti jīra-dānū
07.064.03: mitraḥ | tat | naḥ | varuṇaḥ | devaḥ | aryaḥ | pra | sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ | pathi-bhiḥ | nayantu | bravat | yathā | naḥ | āt | ariḥ | su-dāse | iṣā | madema | saha | deva-gopāḥ
07.064.04: yaḥ | vām | gartam | manasā | takṣat | etam | ūrdhvām | dhītim | kr̥ṇavat | dhārayat | ca | ukṣethām | mitrāvaruṇā | ghr̥tena | tā | rājānā | su-kṣitīḥ | tarpayethām
07.064.05: eṣaḥ | stomaḥ | varuṇa | mitra | tubhyam | somaḥ | śukraḥ | na | vāyave | ayāmi | aviṣṭam | dhiyaḥ | jigr̥tam | puram-dhīḥ | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ

07.065.03: tā | bhūri-pāśau | anr̥tasya | setūiti | duratyetūitiduḥ-atyetū | ripave | martyāya | r̥tasya | mitrāvaruṇā | pathā | vām | apaḥ | na | nāvā | duḥ-itā | tarema
07.065.04: ā | naḥ | mitrāvaruṇā | havya-juṣṭim | ghr̥taiḥ | gavyūtim | ukṣatam | il̥ābhiḥ | prati  | vām | atra | varam | ā | janāya | pr̥ṇītam | udnaḥ | divyasya | cāroḥ
07.065.05: eṣaḥ | stomaḥ | varuṇa | mitra | tubhyam | somaḥ | śukraḥ | na | vāyave | ayāmi | aviṣṭam | dhiyaḥ | jigr̥tam | puram-dhīḥ | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ

07.066.02: yā | dhārayanta | devāḥ | su-dakṣā | dakṣa-pitarā | asuryāya | pra-mahasā

07.066.11: vi | ye | dadhuḥ | śaradam | māsam | āt | ahaḥ | yajñam | aktum | ca | āt | r̥cam | anāpyam | varuṇaḥ | mitraḥ | aryamā | kṣatram | rājānaḥ | āśata

07.071.05: yuvam | cyavānam | jarasaḥ | amumuktam | ni | pedave | ūhathuḥ | āśum | aśvam | ni ḥ | aṁhasaḥ | tamasaḥ | spartam | atrim | ni | jāhuṣam | śithire | dhātam | antari ti

10.061.24: adha | nu | asya | jenyasya | puṣṭau | vr̥thā | rebhantaḥ | īmahe | tat | oṁ iti | nu | saraṇyuḥ | asya | sūnuḥ | aśvaḥ | vipraḥ | ca | asi | śravasaḥ | ca | sātau
10.061.25: yuvoḥ | yadi | sakhyāya | asme iti | śardhāya | stomam | jujuṣe | namasvān | viśvatra | yasmin | ā | giraḥ | sam-īcīḥ | pūrvī-iva | gātuḥ | dāśat | sūnr̥tāyai
10.061.26: saḥ | gr̥ṇānaḥ | at-bhiḥ | deva-vān | iti | su-bandhuḥ | namasā | su-uktaiḥ | vardhat | ukthaiḥ | vacaḥ-bhiḥ | ā | hi | nūnam | vi | adhvā | eti | payasaḥ | usriyāyāḥ
10.061.27: te | oṁ iti | su | naḥ | mahaḥ | yajatrāḥ | bhūta | devāsaḥ | ūtaye | sa-joṣāḥ | ye | vājān | anayata | vi-yantaḥ | ye | stha | ni-cetāraḥ | amūrāḥ
10.062.01: ye | yajñena | dakṣiṇayā | sam-aktāḥ | indrasya | sakhyam | amr̥ta-tvam | ānaśa | tebhyaḥ | bhadram | aṅgirasaḥ | vaḥ | astu | prati | gr̥bhṇīta | mānavam | su-medhasaḥ
10.062.02: ye | ut-ājan | pitaraḥ | go--mayam | vasu | r̥tena | abhindan | pari-vatsare | valam | dīrghāyu-tvam | aṅgirasaḥ | vaḥ | astu | prati | gr̥bhṇīta | mānavam | su-medhasaḥ
10.062.03: ye | r̥tena | sūryam | ā | arohayan | divi | aprathayan | pr̥thivīm | mātaram | vi | suprajāḥ-tvam | aṅgirasaḥ | vaḥ | astu | prati | gr̥bhṇīta | mānavam | su-medhasaḥ
10.062.04: ayam | nābhā | vadati | valgu | vaḥ | gr̥he | deva-putrāḥ | r̥ṣayaḥ | tat | śr̥ṇotana | su-brahmaṇyam | aṅgirasaḥ | vaḥ | astu | prati | gr̥bhṇīta | mānavam | su-medhasaḥ
10.062.05: vi-rūpāsaḥ | it | r̥ṣayaḥ | te | it | gambhīra-vepasaḥ | te | aṅgirasaḥ | sūnavaḥ | te | agneḥ | pari | jajñire
10.062.06: ye | agneḥ | pari | jajñire | vi-rūpāsaḥ | divaḥ | pari | nava-gvaḥ | nu | daśa-gvaḥ | aṅgiraḥ-tamaḥ | sacā | deveṣu | maṁhate
10.062.07: indreṇa | yujā | niḥ | sr̥janta | vāghataḥ | vrajam | go--mantam | aśvinam | sahasram | me | dadataḥ | aṣṭa-karṇyaḥ | śravaḥ | deveṣu | akrata
10.062.08: pra | nūnam | jāyatām | ayam | manuḥ | tokma-iva | rohatu | yaḥ | sahasram | śata-aśvam | sadyaḥ | dānāya | maṁhate
10.062.09: na | tam | aśnoti | kaḥ | cana | divaḥ-iva | sānu | ārabham | sāvarṇyasya | dakṣiṇā | vi | sindhuḥ-iva | paprathe
10.062.10: uta | dāsā | pari-viṣe | smaddiṣṭī itismat-diṣṭī | go--parīṇasā | yaduḥ | turvaḥ | ca | māmahe
10.062.11: sahasra-dāḥ | grāma-nīḥ | mā | riṣat | manuḥ | sūryeṇa | asya | yatamānā | etu | dakṣiṇā | sāvarṇeḥ | devāḥ | pra | tirantu | āyuḥ | yasmin | asrāntāḥ | asanāma | vājam
10.063.01: parāvataḥ | ye | didhiṣante | āpyam | manu-prītāsaḥ | janima | vivasvataḥ | yayāteḥ | ye | nahuṣyasya | barhiṣi | devāḥ | āsate | te | adhi | bruvantu | naḥ
10.063.02: viśvā | hi | vaḥ | namasyāni | vandyā | nāmāni | devāḥ | uta | yajñiyāni | vaḥ | ye | stha | jātāḥ | aditeḥ | at-bhyaḥ | pari | ye | pr̥thivyāḥ | te | me | iha | śruta | havam
10.063.03: yebhyaḥ | mātā | madhu-mat | pinvate | payaḥ | pīyūṣam | dyauḥ | aditiḥ | adri-barhāḥ | uktha-śuṣmān | vr̥ṣa-bharān | svapnasaḥ | tān | ādityān | anu | mada | svastaye
10.063.04: nr̥-cakṣasaḥ | ani-miṣantaḥ | arhaṇā | br̥hat | devāsaḥ | amr̥ta-tvam | ānaśuḥ | jyotiḥ-rathāḥ | ahi-māyāḥ | anāgasaḥ | divaḥ | varṣmāṇam | vasate | svastaye
10.063.05: sam-rājaḥ | ye | su-vr̥dhaḥ | yajñam | āyayuḥ | apari-hvr̥tāḥ | dadhire | divi | kṣayam | tān | ā | vivāsa | namasā | suvr̥kti-bhiḥ | mahaḥ | ādityān | aditim | svastaye
10.063.06: kaḥ | vaḥ | stomam | rādhati | yam | jujoṣatha | viśve | devāsaḥ | manuṣaḥ | yati | sthana | kaḥ | vaḥ | adhvaram | tuvi-jātāḥ | aram | karat | yaḥ | naḥ | parṣat | at i | aṁhaḥ | svastaye
10.063.07: yebhyaḥ | hotrām | prathamām | āyeje | manuḥ | samiddha-agniḥ | manasā | sapta | hotr̥-bhiḥ | te | ādityāḥ | abhayam | śarma | yacchata | su-gā | naḥ | karta | su-pathā | svastaye
10.063.08: ye | īśire | bhuvanasya | pra-cetasaḥ | viśvasya | sthātuḥ | jagataḥ | ca | mantavaḥ | te | naḥ | kr̥tāt | akr̥tāt enasaḥ | pari | adya | devāsaḥ | pipr̥ta | svastaye
10.063.09: bhareṣu | indram | su-havam | havāmahe | aṁhaḥ-mucam | su-kr̥tam | daivyam | janam | agnim | mitram | varuṇam | sātaye | bhagam | dyāvāpr̥thivī iti | marutaḥ | svastaye
10.063.10: su-trāmāṇam | pr̥thivīm | dyām | anehasam | su-śarmāṇam | aditim | su-pranītim | daivīm | nāvam | su-aritrām | anāgasam | asravantīm | ā | ruhema | svastaye
10.063.11: viśve | yajatrāḥ | adhi | vocata | ūtaye | trāyadhvam | naḥ | duḥ-evāyāḥ | abhi-hrutaḥ | satyayā | vaḥ | deva-hūtyā | huvema | śr̥ṇvataḥ | devāḥ | avase | svastaye
10.063.12: apa | amīvām | apa | viśvām | anāhutim | apa | arātim | duḥ-vidatrām | agha-yataḥ | āre | devāḥ | dveṣaḥ | asmat | yuyotana | uru | naḥ | śarma | yacchata | svastaye
10.063.13: ariṣṭaḥ | saḥ | martaḥ | viśvaḥ | edhate | pra | pra-jābhiḥ | jāyate | dharmaṇaḥ | pari | yam | ādityāsaḥ | nayatha | sunīti-bhiḥ | ati | viśvāni | duḥ-itā | svastaye
10.063.14: yam | devāsaḥ | avatha | vāja-sātau | yam | śūra-sātā | marutaḥ | hite | dhane | prātaḥ-yāvānam | ratham | indra | sānasim | ariṣyantam | ā | ruhema | svastaye
10.063.15: svasti | naḥ | pathyāsu | dhanva-su | svasti | ap-su | vr̥jane | svaḥ-vati | svasti | naḥ | putra-kr̥theṣu | yoniṣu | svasti | rāye | marutaḥ | dadhātana
10.063.16: svastiḥ | it | hi | pra-pathe | śreṣṭhā | rekṇasvatī | abhi | yā | vāmam | eti | sā | naḥ | amā | so iti | araṇe | ni | pātu | su-āveśā | bhavatu | deva-gopā
10.063.17: eva | plateḥ | sūnuḥ | avīvr̥dhat | vaḥ | viśve | ādityāḥ | adite | manīṣī | īśānāsaḥ | naraḥ | amartyena | astāvi | janaḥ | divyaḥ | gayena
10.064.01: kathā | devānām | katamasya | yāmani | su-mantu | nāma | śr̥ṇvatām | manāmahe | kaḥ | mr̥l̥āti | katamaḥ | naḥ | mayaḥ | karat | katamaḥ | ūtī | abhi | ā | vavartati
10.064.02: r̥tu-yanti | kratavaḥ | hr̥t-su | dhītayaḥ | venanti | venāḥ | patayanti | ā | diśaḥ | na | marḍitā | vidyate | anyaḥ | ebhyaḥ | deveṣu | me | adhi | kāmāḥ | ayaṁsata
10.064.03: narāśaṁsam | vā | pūṣaṇam | agohyam | agnim | deva-iddham | abhi | arcase | girā | sūryāmāsā | candramasā | yamam | divi | tritam | vātam | uṣasam | aktum | aśvinā
10.064.04: kathā | kaviḥ | tuvi-ravān | kayā | girā | br̥haspatiḥ | vavr̥dhate | suvr̥kti-bhiḥ | ajaḥ | eka-pāt | su-havebhiḥ | r̥kva-bhiḥ | ahiḥ | śr̥ṇotu | budhnyaḥ | havīmani
10.064.05: dakṣasya | vā | adite | janmani | vrate | rājānā | mitrāvaruṇā | vivāsasi | atūrta-panthāḥ | puru-rathaḥ | aryamā | sapta-hotā | viṣu-rūpeṣu | janma-su
10.064.06: te | naḥ | arvantaḥ | havana-śrutaḥ | havam | viśve | śr̥ṇvantu | vājinaḥ | mi ta-dravaḥ | sahasra-sāḥ | medhasātau-iva | tmanā | mahaḥ | ye | dhanam | sam-itheṣu | jabhrire
10.064.07: pra | vaḥ | vāyum | ratha-yujam | puram-dhim | stomaiḥ | kr̥ṇudhvam | sakhyāya | pūṣaṇam | te | hi | devasya | savituḥ | savīmani | kratum | sacante | sa-citaḥ | sa-cetasaḥ
10.064.08: triḥ | sapta | sasrāḥ | nadyaḥ | mahīḥ | apaḥ | vanaspatīn | parvatān | agnim | ūtaye | kr̥śānum | astr̥r̥r̥n | tiṣyam | sadha-sthe | ā | rudram | rudreṣu | rudriyam | havāmahe
10.064.09: sarasvatī | sarayuḥ | sindhuḥ | ūrmi-bhiḥ | mahaḥ | mahīḥ | avasā | yantu | vakṣaṇīḥ | devīḥ | āpaḥ | mātaraḥ | sūdayitnvaḥ | ghr̥ta-vat | payaḥ | madhu-mat | naḥ | arcata
10.064.10: uta | mātā | br̥hat-divā | śr̥ṇotu | naḥ | tvaṣṭā | devebhiḥ | jani-bhiḥ | pitā | vacaḥ | r̥bhukṣāḥ | vājaḥ | rathaḥ-patiḥ | bhagaḥ | raṇvaḥ | śaṁsaḥ | śaśamānasya | pātu | naḥ
10.064.11: raṇvaḥ | sam-dr̥ṣṭau | pitumān-iva | kṣayaḥ | bhadrā | rudrāṇām | marutām | upa-stutiḥ | gobhiḥ | syāma | yaśasaḥ | janeṣu | ā | sadā | devāsaḥ | il̥ayā | sacemahi
10.064.12: yam | me | dhiyam | marutaḥ | indra | devāḥ | adadāta | varuṇa | mitra | yūyam | tām | pīpayata | payasāiva | dhenum | kuvit | giraḥ | adhi | rathe | vahātha
10.064.13: kuvit | aṅga | prati | yathā | cit | asya | naḥ | sa-jātyasya | marutaḥ | bubodhatha | nābhā | yatra | prathamam | sam-nasāmahe | tatra | jāmi-tvam | aditiḥ | dadhātu | naḥ
10.064.14: te | hi | dyāvāpr̥thivī iti | mātarā | mahī | devī | devān | janmanā | yajñiyeiti | itaḥ | ubhe iti | bibhr̥taḥ | ubhayam | bharīma-bhiḥ | puru | retāṁsi | pitr̥-bhiḥ | ca | siñcataḥ
10.064.15: vi | sā | hotrā | viśvam | aśnoti | vāryam | br̥haspatiḥ | aramatiḥ | panīyasī | grāvā | yatra | madhu-sut | ucyate | br̥hat | avīvaśanta | mati-bhiḥ | manīṣiṇaḥ
10.064.16: eva | kaviḥ | tuvi-ravān | r̥ta-jñāḥ | draviṇasyuḥ | draviṇasaḥ | cakānaḥ | ukthebhiḥ | atra | mati-bhiḥ | ca | vipraḥ | apīpayat | gayaḥ | divyāni | janma
10.064.17: eva | plateḥ | sūnuḥ | avīvr̥dhat | vaḥ | viśve | ādityāḥ | adite | manīṣī | īśānāsaḥ | naraḥ | amartyena | astāvi | janaḥ | divyaḥ | gayena
10.065.01: agniḥ | indraḥ | varuṇaḥ | mitraḥ | āryamā | vāyuḥ | pūṣā | sarasvatī | sa-joṣasaḥ | ādityāḥ | viṣṇuḥ | marutaḥ | svaḥ | br̥hat | somaḥ | rudraḥ | aditiḥ | brahmaṇaḥ | patiḥ
10.065.02: indrāgnī iti | vr̥tra-hatyeṣu | satpatī itisat-patī | mithaḥ | hinvānā | tanvā | sam-okasā | antarikṣam | mahi | ā | papruḥ | ojasā | somaḥ | ghr̥ta-śrīḥ | mahimānam | īrayan
10.065.03: teṣām | hi | mahnā | māhatām | anarvaṇām | stomān | iyarmi | r̥ta-jñāḥ | r̥ta-vr̥dhām | ye | apsavam | arṇavam | citra-rādhasaḥ | te | naḥ | rāsantām | mahaye | su-mitryāḥ
10.065.04: svaḥ-naram | antarikṣāṇi | rocanā | dyāvābhūmī iti | pr̥thivīm | skambhuḥ | ojasā | pr̥kṣāḥ-iva | mahayantaḥ | su-rātayaḥ | devāḥ | stavante | manuṣāya | sūrayaḥ
10.065.06: yā | gauḥ | vartanim | pari-eti | niḥ-kr̥tam | payaḥ | duhānā | vrata-nīḥ | avārataḥ | sā | pra-bruvāṇā | varuṇāya | dāśuṣe | devebhyaḥ | dāśat | haviṣā | vivasvate
10.065.07: divakṣasaḥ | agni-jihvāḥ | r̥ta-vr̥dhaḥ | r̥tasya | yonim | vi-mr̥śantaḥ | āsate | dyām | skabhitvī | apaḥ | ā | cakruḥ | ojasā | yajñam | janitvī | tanvi | ni | mamr̥juḥ
10.065.08: pari-kṣitā | pitarā | pūrvajāvarī itipūrva-jāvarī | r̥tasya | yonā | kṣayataḥ | sam-okasā | dyāvāpr̥thivī iti | varuṇāya | savrateitisa-vrate | ghr̥ta-vat | payaḥ | mahiṣāya | pinvataḥ
10.065.09: parjanyāvātā | vr̥ṣabhā | purīṣiṇā | indravāyū iti | varuṇaḥ | mitraḥ | aryamā | devān | ādityān | aditim | havāmahe | ye | pārthivāsaḥ | divyāsaḥ | ap-su | ye
10.065.10: tvaṣṭāram | vāyum | r̥bhavaḥ | yaḥ | ohate | daivyā | hotārau | uṣasam | svastaye | br̥haspatim | vr̥tra-khādam | su-medhasam | indriyam | somam | dhana-sāḥ | oṁ iti | īmahe
10.065.11: brahma | gām | aśvam | janayantaḥ | oṣadhīḥ | vanaspatīn | pr̥thivīm | parvatān | apaḥ | sūrya | divi | rohayantaḥ | su-dānavaḥ | āryā | vratā | vi-sr̥jantaḥ | adhi | kṣami
10.065.12: bhujyum | aṁhasaḥ | pipr̥thaḥ | niḥ | aśvinā | śyāvam | putram | vadhri-matyāḥ | ajinvatam | kama-dyuvam | vi-madāya | ūhathuḥ | yuvam | viṣṇāpvam | viśvakāya | ava | sr̥jathaḥ
10.065.13: pāvīravī | tanyatuḥ | eka-pāt | ajaḥ | divaḥ | dhartā | sindhuḥ | āpaḥ | samudriyaḥ | viśve | devāsaḥ | śr̥ṇavan | vacāṁsi | me | sarasvatī | saha | dhībhiḥ | puram-dhyā
10.065.14: viśve | devāḥ | saha | dhībhiḥ | puram-dhyā | manoḥ | yajatrāḥ | amr̥tāḥ | r̥ta-jñāḥ | rāti-sācaḥ | abhi-sācaḥ | svaḥ-vidaḥ svaḥ | giraḥ | brahma | su-uktam | juṣerata
10.065.15: devān | vasiṣṭhaḥ | amr̥tān | vavande | ye | viśvā | bhuvanā | abhi | pra-tasthuḥ | te | naḥ | rāsantām | uru-gāyam | adya | yūyam | pāta | svasti-bhiḥ | sadā | naḥ
10.066.01: devān | huve | br̥hat-śravasaḥ | svastaye | jyotiḥ-kr̥taḥ | adhvarasya | pra-cetasaḥ | ye | vavr̥dhuḥ | pra-taram | viśva-vedasaḥ | indra-jyeṣṭhāsaḥ | amr̥tāḥ | r̥ta-vr̥dhaḥ
10.066.02: indra-prasūtāḥ | varuṇa-praśiṣṭāḥ | ye | sūryasya | jyotiṣaḥ | bhāgam | ānaśuḥ | marut-gaṇe | vr̥jane | manma | dhīmahi | māghone | yajñam | janayanta | sūrayaḥ
10.066.03: indraḥ | vasu-bhiḥ | pari | pātu | naḥ | gayam | ādityaiḥ | naḥ | aditiḥ | śarma | yacchatu | rudraḥ | rudrebhiḥ | devaḥ | mr̥l̥ayāti | naḥ | tvaṣṭā | naḥ | gnābhiḥ | suvitāya | jinvatu
10.066.04: aditiḥ | dyāvāpr̥thivī iti | r̥tam | mahat | indrāviṣṇūiti | marutaḥ | svaḥ | br̥hat | devān | ādityān | avase | havāmahe | vasūn | rudrān | savitāram | su-daṁsasam
10.066.05: sarasvān | dhībhiḥ | varuṇaḥ | dhr̥ta-vrataḥ | pūṣā | viṣṇuḥ | mahimā | vāyuḥ | aśvinā | brahma-kr̥taḥ | amr̥tāḥ | viśva-vedasaḥ | śarma | naḥ | yaṁsan | tri-varūtham | aṁhasaḥ
10.066.06: vr̥ṣā | yajñaḥ | vr̥ṣaṇaḥ | santu | yajñiyāḥ | vr̥ṣaṇaḥ | devāḥ | vr̥ṣaṇaḥ | haviḥ-kr̥taḥ | vr̥ṣaṇā | dyāvāpr̥thivī iti | r̥ta-varī ity r̥ta-varī | vr̥ṣā | parjanyaḥ | vr̥ṣaṇaḥ | vr̥ṣa-stubhaḥ
10.066.07: agnīṣomā | vr̥ṣaṇā | vāja-sātaye | puru-praśastā | vr̥ṣaṇau | upa | bruve | yau | ījire | vr̥ṣaṇaḥ | deva-yajyayā | tā | naḥ | śarma | tri-varūtham | vi | yāṁsataḥ
10.066.08: dhr̥ta-vratāḥ | kṣatriyāḥ | yajñaniḥ-kr̥taḥ | br̥hat-divāḥ | adhvarāṇām | abhi-śri yaḥ | agni-hāotāraḥ | r̥ta-sāpaḥ | adruhaḥ | apaḥ | asr̥jan | anu | vr̥tra-tūyer
10.066.09: dyāvāpr̥thivī iti | janayan | abhi | vratā | āpaḥ | oṣadhīḥ | vanināni | yajñiyā | antarikṣam | svaḥ | ā | papruḥ | ūtaye | vaśam | devāsaḥ | tanvi | ni | mamr̥juḥ
10.066.10: dhartāraḥ | divaḥ | r̥bhavaḥ | su-hastāḥ | vātāparjanyā | mahiṣasya | tanyatoḥ | āpaḥ | oṣadhīḥ | pra | tirantu | naḥ | giraḥ | bhagaḥ | rātiḥ | vājinaḥ | yantu | me | havam
10.066.11: samudraḥ | sindhuḥ | rajaḥ | antarikṣam | ajaḥ | eka-pāt | tanayitnuḥ | arṇavaḥ | ahiḥ | budhnyaḥ | śr̥ṇavat | vacāṁsi | me | viśve | devāsaḥ | uta | sūrayaḥ | mama
